review: Love the Amazon Fire TV Stick - Easy setup, great user interface - what more can you ask for?
author: Scott SG

review: The Amazon Fire Stick was very easy to setup. We took it on vacation and used it at the hotel.  We have been planning on purchasing a new smart tv, but now we've decided to purchase a regular tv and just use the Amazon Fire Stick with it. We're very happy with our purchase and would highly recommend it.
author: Unknown

review: Love it! So easy to set up. I'm always leary of no trouble installation but this exceeded my expectations.
author: Cathy S. Irvin

review: Loved this so much that I also purchased one for my mother.  Wow, did I bank some brownie points on this one!
author: R. Norris

review: Wish it was faster but for being a small stick, it meets expectations
author: Josh Sommers

review: Excellent inexpensive device for running Kodi on
author: Amazon Customer
